name: DinoParty2
description: Dinoparty is a video board game example. It features a roll and move board where players roll dice to move their pieces around the board. Landing on certain spaces gains gold, or cards that can be played to activate beneficial effects. When reaching the red space, 20 gold can be exchanged for a point. First player to collect three points wins. At the end of each turn, a random minigame is chosen from a list of three minigames. Players play the minigames to gain bonus gold.
